newsitem.title: JAPAN: MITI sees Jan-Mar steel output at 24.65 mln tonnes.
newsitem.headline: MITI sees Jan-Mar steel output at 24.65 mln tonnes.

text.p: Japan's crude steel output in the January-March period is expected to be 24.65 million tonnes, up 3.2 percent from a year earlier, the Ministry of International Trade and Industry (MITI) said on Tuesday.

The ministry also said that production in the period, the final quarter of the 1996/97 fiscal year, would fall 4.4 percent from the output of 25.79 million tonnes expected in the October-December quarter.
